entry.title: Gavin's post-0.9 TODO list...
entry.summary: The given context is an email message with a PGP encrypted message attached to it. The email was intended for Peter but was sent to John Dillon by mistake. The encrypted message was written in GnuPG v1.4.11 (GNU/Linux). The message contains a long string of characters that seem to be encoded and has a header and footer indicating that it is a PGP message. The message also includes links to various websites and email addresses. It is not clear what the message is about or who the sender is.
